doc.title: Fridays For Future –Strike Statistics
doc.excerpt: The success of Fridays for Future Strikes in numbers. From 1 to 13,000,000 in just over a year.

main.quote: “You are never too small to make a difference!”Greta Thunberg
main.p: Here is the success of Fridays for Future, FFF. In just over a year, from one solitary school striking girl, Greta Thunberg, to one of the biggest manifestations of all time.
The more we are, the more power for change.
main.head: how to strike
main.p: Check how you can make a difference with a strike or action.
